trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_SEQ_00<tab>Lumull is not yet ready to release you to the sweet meditations of manual labor.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_TODO_01<tab>Distribute the Sleepless Rhapsody to citizens of Treno.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_001<tab>I see how drinking that would be...unifying. And it is impressive that they have maintained the tradition here, so far from the Milalla's native lands.

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_GRAHATIA_000_002<tab>Given its ability to counteract lightning's influence on the body, that remedy could be of use to the people of Alexandria as well. I am certain Lumull would be more than happy to offer it to them...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_011<tab>Ah yes, the repairs...

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_012<tab>Are you certain you want to be put to work? If you've come all the way out to visit us, you must have had more important things in mind. And you've already helped protect the city...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_013<tab>Actually, our goal was to ascertain the present state of the Mist Continent.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_014<tab>The whole continent!? Did you come from across the sea?
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_015<tab>Not exactly...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_016<tab>We've actually come from Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_017<tab>Alexandria? Are you quite, <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> sure?
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_018<tab>...No, sorry, of course you're sure. Would be rude of me to doubt you.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_019<tab>It's just, it's not every day that we get visitors, let alone from a nation that up and vanished!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_020<tab>I know that it must come as something of a shock.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_021<tab>But this is our first time in Treno, and we should like to get to know the city and its people. That is why we proposed lending a hand to those in need.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_022<tab>I see! In that case...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_023<tab>Why don't you help distribute this remedy to the rest of our people?
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_024<tab>Ordinarily, everyone would've already come for a cup, but the fiends made quite a mess this time. Might be a while before some can step away from their work.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_025<tab>Never fear, though─even if their hands are busy, they'll be more than happy to spare a few words for fascinating folks from afar.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_026<tab>We would appreciate that. Thank you, Lumull.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_027<tab>You're the ones doing me a favor, honestly! Here, take this batch.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_LUMULL_000_028<tab>I'll deliver some to town hall, so you can attend to areas you haven't seen yet!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_GRAHATIA_000_031<tab>Like Miayli, Lumull seemed taken aback by mention of Alexandria. Perhaps they had friends or loved ones who disappeared along with it.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_031<tab>If we split up, we can spend more time speaking with the locals while ensuring everyone receives the remedy promptly. Could you each take a portion?
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_Q1_000_032<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_A1_000_001<tab>Of course. I haven't had my fill of conversation yet!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_A1_000_002<tab>Rest assured that I can handle pouring liquid into a cup.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_GRAHATIA_000_033<tab>I too should be glad to dole out a few servings.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_034<tab>Wonderful! Let me divide this up...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_035<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, why don't you make rounds of the southern part of the city? Raha and I shall tend to the north.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_036<tab>Right, let's go and acquire some insights!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_041<tab>So the taste is challenging even when one is accustomed to it...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_GRAHATIA_000_042<tab>Is that so? This city is remarkably self-sufficient.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTA05429_000_051<tab>You must be one of those visitors Lumull mentioned. Odd place to be visiting, though.

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTA05429_000_052<tab>Oh, you came to deliver the remedy? Thank you kindly. I was hauling beast carcasses in for processing and copped a good dose of discharged energy for my troubles. It brought on the levin sickness something fierce...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTA05429_000_053<tab>Still, we don't go hunting outside the barrier, so we don't want to waste any part of the creatures that find their way in.

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTA05429_000_054<tab>Pelts that're highly charged with lightning aether are the most valuable, of course. Tan them with the right stuff, and you can turn them into protective clothing that keeps you from getting zapped.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTA05429_000_055<tab>The beasts you felled will all be put to good use. Thanks again!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTB05429_000_061<tab>You're that mighty monster-slayer I saw earlier! It's an honor.

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTB05429_000_062<tab><var 1A 02 /var>And<var 1A 01 /var> you've brought Sleepless Rhapsody! Bless you─I'm dead on my feet after that battle. We don't usually have that many beasts breaking through at once.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTB05429_000_063<tab>Practice keeps one's skills sharp, though, so in a way I'm glad for it. And I learned a thing or two from watching you.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTB05429_000_064<tab>Oh, I can hardly wait to get to work on my grimoire! I have a number of ideas for improved geometries...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTB05429_000_065<tab>The thoughtful application of new learning is what keeps our ancestors' magic alive and flourishing!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTC05429_000_071<tab>There's a fresh face if ever I saw one... And what's that in your hand?
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTC05429_000_072<tab>Oh, don't mind if I do! Safety inspections take priority, but the battle doesn't feel over until I've had a cup of Sleepless Rhapsody...
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTC05429_000_073<tab>I'm proud to say that I have some small part in preparing it, too. The herbs come from my very own growery.

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTC05429_000_074<tab>One of the greatest discoveries of our time is that seeds carried in by invading creatures can be cultivated into remarkable plants. Plants with the potential to mitigate the lightning's effects!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTC05429_000_075<tab>And with as many hides as we have this time─not to mention stomachs!─it's entirely possible we'll find new varieties of herbs among our harvest.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_GRAHATIA_000_081<tab>Finished with your supply of remedy as well, have you? I expect the scent will linger on our clothing for days...

TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTA05429_000_082<tab>Our histories say that when large creatures broke through the barrier, our bravest fighters would launch themselves onto their backs with the trebuchet. We have you to thank for not needing to revive that tradition today!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTB05429_000_083<tab>Now I must face my true nemesis: circles. They're so hard to draw without making them all wobbly!
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_RESIDENTC05429_000_084<tab>The flowers around the city also sprouted from seeds that creatures carried in. So truth be told, I find it difficult to begrudge them their trespass.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_091<tab>Between the three of us, we ought to have covered every area aside from Lumull's.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_092<tab>One of the people I spoke with asked me to pass something along to him, but he hasn't returned yet.
TEXT_KINGMJ104_05429_KRILE_000_093<tab>In the meantime, shall we discuss what we've learned?
